body_html: There are many papers that empirically apply NAdam, a couple that empirically apply AccSGD ('17 version, '18 version), and one paper that empirically applies (a restricted parameterization of) PID.
body_text: There are many papers that empirically apply NAdam, a couple that empirically apply AccSGD ('17 version, '18 version), and one paper that empirically applies (a restricted parameterization of) PID.
body: There are many papers that empirically apply [NAdam](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=8928754325580168542), a couple that empirically apply AccSGD (['17 version](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=15772383141264539771), ['18 version](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cites=6907311906014063619)), and one paper that empirically applies (a restricted parameterization of) [PID](http://openaccess.thecvf.com/content_cvpr_2018/html/An_A_PID_Controller_CVPR_2018_paper.html).
